basic.description: Intended to explore health content, philosophies and methodologies from Grade 7 to 12.  The major method of delivery is participator-lecture, demonstrations, student presentations and projects which are skill-oriented and practical.  Some of the health topics in the Ontario Curriculum Guidelines are discussed.  Compulsory and important health topics in the Ontario Curriculum Guidelines are fully developed and demonstrated.
basic.subject: CURR
basic.title: Health and Physical Ed (IS)
